content.rendered:
Seminars

  • TAO seminar (INRIA Saclay)
  • Seminaires d’Apprentissage et de Statistique de l’Université Paris-Saclay
  • SequeL seminar (INRIA Lille)
  • Model Selection seminar (University Lille 1)
  • SMILE seminar (ENS Paris)
  • Statistics seminar (IMT Toulouse)

Mailing lists

  • ML-news: Machine Learning news
  • PS-news: Probability and Statistics news (administrator).
  • RL-list: Reinforcement Learning Mailing List
  • ProML (french): Liste de diffusion liée à la Fédération des Équipes de Recherche en Apprentissage.
  • AOAP: Annals of Applied Probability
  • AOAS: Annals of Applied Statistics
  • AOP: Annals of Probability
  • AOS: Annals of Statistics
  • EJP: Electronic Journal of Probability
  • EJS: Electronic Journal of Statistics
  • Jmlr-announce: Journal of Machine Learning Research annoucements
  • AIHP: Alerts and other special announcements related to the Annales de l’Institut Henri Poincaré
  • BERN: Alerts and other special announcements related to the Bernoulli Journal

Also, do not forget to regularly check:

  • London Mathematical society Lecture Series.
  • College de France – conférenciers invités.
  • Master MVA, ENS Cachan – invited lecturers.
  • Centre de Recherche en Economie et en Statistique – invited lecturers.
  • International Statistical Institute – calendar of events.
  • International Academic Conference System – call for papers.
  • Conferences and Meetings on Probability and Statistics.

Journals

  • AAP: Annals of Applied Probability
  • AP: Annals of Probability
  • AR: Autonomous Robot
  • AS: Annals of Statistics
  • MLJ: Machine Learning Journal
  • JMLR: Journal of Machine Learning Research
  • JSFS: Journal de la Société Française de Statistiques
  • JTP: Journal of Theoretical Probability

Conferences, workshops and symposia

  • List of Machine Learning call for papers.
  • ACML: Asian Conference on Machine Learning
  • AI&STATS: Artificial Intelligence and Statistics
  • ALT: Algorithmic Learning Theory
  • COLT: Conference On Learning Theory
  • ECML: European Conference on Machine Learning
  • ESANN: European Symposium on Artificial Neural Networks
  • EWRL: European Workshop on Reinforcement Learning
  • ICAI: International Conference on Artificial Intelligence
  • ICANN: Internationale Conference on Artificial Neural Networks
  • ICML: International Conference on Machine Learning
  • NIPS: The Neural Information Processing Systems
  • SMLS: Sparsity in Machine Learning and Statistics
  • RoboCup: Robocup International Symposium

Blogs and videos

  • Terence Tao
  • Jürgen Schmidhuber
  • Video lectures
  • MIT World
  • Research Channel
  • Diffusion ENS (fr)
  • Images du CNRS (fr)
  • Univers Science (fr)
  • Khan Academy

Research centers

  • INRIA Lille – Nord europe
  • Sequential Learning Project
  • Institut de Mathématiques de Toulouse
  • Equipe de Statistique et Probabilités de l’IMT

Schools

  • Ecole Normale Supérieure de Cachan (cachan)
  • Ecole Normale Supérieure de Cachan (ker lann)
